\begin{array}{l}{{\tilde{D}=e_{i}\cdot\tilde{\nabla}_{i}}}\\ {{\ }}\\ {{\displaystyle=D+\frac12k_{i j}e_{i}e_{j}e_{0}}}\\ {{\ }}\\ {{\displaystyle={\mathcal{D}}-\frac12({\mathrm{tr}}\,k)e_{0},}}\end{array}

Theorem 8.21 (Witten). Let  $(M,g,k)$  be a spin initial data set. For ang  $\psi\in C^{\infty}(\tilde{S}(M))$  

$$
\tilde{D}^{2}\psi=\tilde{\nabla}_{i}^{\ast}\tilde{\nabla}_{i}\psi+\frac{1}{2}(\mu+J e_{0})\cdot\psi,
$$
 
where  $\tilde{\nabla}^{*}$  is theformal adjointof  $\tilde{\nabla}$  on  ${\tilde{S}}(M)$
